name: n3
description: Lightning fast, asynchronous, streaming Turtle / N3 / RDF library.
author: Ruben Verborgh <ruben.verborgh@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run build:node && npm run build:browser
scripts.build:browser: rm -rf browser && mkdir browser && browserify -s N3 lib/index.js | uglifyjs > browser/n3.min.js
scripts.spec: npm run spec-turtle && npm run spec-ntriples && npm run spec-nquads && npm run spec-trig && npm run spec-n3 -- -a
scripts.spec-earl: npm run spec-earl-turtle && npm run spec-earl-ntriples && npm run spec-earl-nquads && npm run spec-earl-trig && npm run spec-earl-n3 -- -a && npm run spec-earl-n3-extended -- a
scripts.spec-earl-n3: npm run spec-n3 -- -o earl -p spec/earl-meta.json > spec/earl-n3.ttl
scripts.spec-earl-ntriples: npm run spec-ntriples -- -o earl -p spec/earl-meta.json > spec/earl-ntriples.ttl
scripts.spec-earl-nquads: npm run spec-nquads -- -o earl -p spec/earl-meta.json > spec/earl-nquads.ttl
scripts.spec-earl-turtle: npm run spec-turtle -- -o earl -p spec/earl-meta.json > spec/earl-turtle.ttl
scripts.spec-earl-trig: npm run spec-trig -- -o earl -p spec/earl-meta.json > spec/earl-trig.ttl
